title: Provided that the project proponent shall lay the water, drainage/sewage lines up to the nearest existing lines which are laid by the concerned Planning Authority
clause_text: Provided that the project proponent shall lay the water, drainage/sewage lines up to the nearest existing lines which are laid by the concerned Planning Authority.
